attributes.action: force ISPs to block to illegal sharing of copyrighted media by peer to peer & similar technologies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ISPs make money from providing an internet service, so it stands to reason that they as the "gatekeepers" should be forced to block the mass criminal sharing of others copyright material. 

Further, ISPs should be forced to introduce egress filtering to almost completely remove the possibility of denial of service attacks with forged sender addresses

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
